content: TE-SX SC Scaling chisels Self-sharpening TE-S scaling chisels for scraping away weld spatter, formwork seepage and other residues ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Self-sharpening cutting edge – work more efficiently and for longer with the same chisel, no resharpening or rehardening necessary Ultra-robust – inductive hardening makes these scaling chisels especially resistant to mushrooming, wear and bending Upgraded breaking power – extra-tough connection end transfers more force from the tool to the chisel Improved reliability – dust cap helps to avoid downtime and improve tool lifespan Multiple widths and lengths available – use shorter bits for best energy transmission and increased longevity, and longer ones for piercing deeper or reaching into tight spaces Applications Removing weld spatter, scale and concrete formwork overflow or seepage Channeling in concrete For use with TE-S electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-S Application: Scaling, Channeling Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Connection end | TE-S | Application | Scaling, Channeling | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2168878 - Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 36/5 - Package Size 1 pc - 2168879 - Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 36/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2168880 - Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 36/12 - Package Size 1 pc - 2168881 - Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 43/5 - Package Size 1 pc - 2168882 - Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 43/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2168883 - Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 43/12 - Package Size 1 pc - 2168884 - Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 50/5 - Package Size 1 pc - 2168885 - Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 50/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2168886 - Scaling chisel TE-SX SC 50/12 - Package Size 1 pc
